briefTitle: Fast and Accurate Breast Cancer Diagnosis Using Nanopore Sequencing in Tanzania (Fast-ABCD Sequencing)
officialTitle: Nanopore Sequencing for Accelerating Breast Cancer Diagnosis in Tanzania: a Prospective Observational Study
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patient with suspected diagnosis of breast cancer undergoing biopsy or surgical resection as per institutional guidelines
* Excess fresh tumor sample
* Written informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

- Unable to provide informed consent
